item.title: Music Industry Moves: Capitol Music Group Elevates Jessica Eason and Dante Smith to Senior Vice Presidents
item.description: Jessica Eason and Dante Smith are Capitol Music Group’s newest senior vice presidents, the company announced Wednesday. Eason and Smith will join Justin Grant, named last year as svp/head of urban dig

item.title: Music Industry Moves: Capitol Music Group Elevates Jessica Eason and Dante Smith to Senior Vice Presidents
item.description: Jessica Eason and Dante Smith are Capitol Music Group’s newest senior vice presidents, the company announced Wednesday. Eason and Smith will join Justin Grant, named last year as svp/head of urban dig
